remarks: A partition interval is a subset of the partitioned interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem8.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
fourierdlem8.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
fourierdlem8.q $e |- ( ph -> Q : ( 0 ... M ) --> ( A [,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem8.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) $.
fourierdlem8 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` I ) [,] ( Q ` ( I + 1 ) ) ) C_ ( A [,] B ) ) $.
